Package ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.plugins.typescript

Class TypeScript

java.lang.Object
ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.plugins.typescript.TypeScript
public final class TypeScript extends Object
The primary method of accessing TypeScript language services. This class allows you to hand off service requests to be performed in the background. A callback that you provide will be called with the result once it is available.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    getVersion​(Consumer<String> callback)
    Gets a string describing which version of TypeScript is being used.
    static void
    restart()
    Restarts the service provider.
    static void
    transpile​(String source, Consumer<String> callback)
    Transpiles the specified source code from TypeScript to JavaScript, using default options.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • getVersion

      public static void getVersion​(Consumer<String> callback)
      Gets a string describing which version of TypeScript is being used.
      Parameters:
      callback - will be called with a non-null version string, such as "4.2.0-dev"

    • transpile

      public static void transpile​(String source, Consumer<String> callback)
      Transpiles the specified source code from TypeScript to JavaScript, using default options.
      Parameters:
      source - the non-null code to compile
      callback - the callback to invoke with the result when ready

    • restart

      public static void restart()
      Restarts the service provider. This can be called during development to pick up changes to the service implementation without restarting the app.
